**Rogers Pass Discovery Centre Rehabilitation**
==============================

**Tender Notification**

The Parks Canada Agency invites qualified suppliers to submit proposals for the Stage 1 – Rogers Pass Discovery Centre Rehabilitation project, in accordance with the Solicitation Document.

**Solicitation Number:** 5P468-23-0044/A

**Publication Date:** April 26, 2023

**Tender Closing Date:** May 30, 2023

**Expected Contract Start Date:** June 12, 2023

**Expected Contract End Date:** March 31, 2024

**Project Overview:**

The Rogers Pass Discovery Centre, located within Glacier National Park in British Columbia, requires rehabilitation to address structural and building envelope issues. The project aims to rectify these issues, ensuring a safe and functional visitor experience.

**Selection Criteria:**

The selection process will follow a two-stage evaluation. The Stage 1 evaluation will assess the qualifications of interested suppliers, followed by a Stage 2 evaluation where qualified suppliers will submit further qualifications and a financial proposal.

**Instructions to Suppliers:**

To ensure timely receipt of proposals, please submit your bid via fax or email as indicated in the Solicitation Document. Proposals submitted in person or by courier will not be accepted.

**Technical and Contractual Enquiries:**

Any technical and contractual enquiries should be submitted to the Contracting Authority in writing, with a minimum of eight business days prior to the tender closing date. Responses will be provided accordingly.

**Procurement Requirements:**

The project is subject to the National Parks Regulations and requires adherence to federal mandates and directives regarding sustainable development, accessibility, sanitary facilities, and aesthetics.

**Notice:**

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

**Required Attachments:**

Please find attached the following documents:

* [Parks Canada] Doing Business [Guide]
* [Solicitation Document] Stage 2 – Request for Proposal 23-0044
* Addendum 01 – Stage 1 Solicitation
* Addendum 02 – Stage 1 Solicitation

Please note that late submissions will not be considered, and proposals should be submitted in accordance with the Solicitation Document. We look forward to receiving your proposals.
